selections.name: End Stage
selections.reason: Dominant form at this track and distance. Has won three straight races with consistent speed figures (65). The clear class of the field.

selections.name: L'etoile D'amour
selections.reason: Returns from a break but showed good speed at Mizusawa. Drawn the rail to save ground.

selections.name: Sun Snow White
selections.reason: Second-up today. Showed some ability previously and should strip fitter.

selections.name: Ping Pang Pong
selections.reason: Won well at Saga two starts back. Failed last time but can bounce back in this weak field.

danger_horse.name: L'etoile D'amour
danger_horse.reason: The only runner with recent form comparable to the favorite if the favorite falters.

selections.name: Egg Scrambled
selections.reason: Consistent performer who ran a strong 2nd last start with a solid speed figure (61). Drawn well.

selections.name: Cause A Spike
selections.reason: Faded last time but won the start prior with a competitive figure. Can rebound.

selections.name: Kura Bael
selections.reason: Second run back from a spell. Should improve off the 4th place finish last time.

selections.name: North La Novia
selections.reason: Second run back. Drops in class slightly and could wake up at a price.

danger_horse.name: Cause A Spike
